fields.title: Media Monitoring & Rapid Response
fields.description: Learn how to set up a lightweight comms 'war room' using feeds, labels, and triage to turn noisy inputs into clear actions.

fields.title: AI Foundations for Comms & Crisis Response (Beginner)
fields.description:
A hands-on introduction to using AI responsibly in communications and crisis contexts. Learn safe prompting, triage, drafting, and approvals workflows inside Clarova.

What you'll learn
- Core AI/LLM concepts and limits
- Safe, effective prompting for comms tasks
- Monitoring & triage with AI
- Drafting first-pass statements, internal notes and FAQs
- Running a mini crisis drill with approvals in Clarova

Format
- Bite-sized lessons (5â€“10 min each)
- Copy/paste starter prompts
- A 30-minute mini-drill at the end
- Checklists and a quality rubric you can reuse

fields.title: Crisis Simulation Lab (Intermediate)
fields.description: Practice responding to crises under time pressure. Includes injects, drafting, approvals, and a structured after-action review.
